entries.journal_entry_description: Jark wants you to kill Ragtag Thugs and Mercenaries.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Jark wants you to kill 15 Ragtag Thugs that are loitering to the south.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Jark wants you to kill 15 Ragtag Mercenaries that are loitering to the south.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Great work! That should slow them down.  This buys us time to get the troops trained with the weapons and be prepared for them if they decide to try anything.
